entities.name: eagle
entities.description: The eagle is mentioned as being on something, but its significance and context are not clear. ("ever come across something with her eagle on it")

entities.name: ravenclaws
entities.description: Ravenclaw is a house at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. It is mentioned as having a lost diadem. ("The lost diadem of Ravenclaw? Daddy’s trying to duplicate it.")

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is a student at Hogwarts and a member of the Ravenclaws house. She mentions the lost diadem of Ravenclaw. ("Well, that’s her lost diadem.")

entities.name: padma
entities.description: Padma is a student at Hogwarts and a member of the Ravenclaws house. She is part of the group being addressed by Harry. ("He looked hopefully toward the little group of Ravenclaws, to Padma...")

entities.name: michael
entities.description: Michael is a student at Hogwarts and a member of the Ravenclaws house. He mentions that the lost diadem is indeed lost. ("Yeah, but the lost diadem,” said Michael Corner, rolling his eyes, “is lost, Luna.")

entities.name: terry
entities.description: Terry is a student at Hogwarts and a member of the Ravenclaws house. He explains what a diadem is to Ron. ("It’s a kind of crown,” said Terry Boot.")

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is a student at Hogwarts and a member of the Ravenclaws house. She mentions that the lost diadem vanished with Ravenclaw herself. ("Professor Flitwick says the diadem vanished with Ravenclaw herself.")

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is a student at Hogwarts and has a chair where Luna is perched on its arm. ("perched on the arm of Ginny’s chair")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts and asks what a diadem is. ("Sorry, but what is a diadem?” asked Ron.")

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick is mentioned as saying that the diadem vanished with Ravenclaw herself. ("Professor Flitwick says the diadem vanished with Ravenclaw herself.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts and asks when the lost diadem was lost. ("When was it lost?” asked Harry.")

entities.name: daddy
entities.description: Daddy is mentioned as trying to duplicate the lost diadem of Ravenclaw. ("The lost diadem of Ravenclaw? Daddy’s trying to duplicate it.")

relationships.description: Luna is a member of the Ravenclaws house. ("Well, that’s her lost diadem.")
Padma is a member of the Ravenclaws house. ("He looked hopefully toward the little group of Ravenclaws, to Padma...")
Michael is a member of the Ravenclaws house. ("Yeah, but the lost diadem,” said Michael Corner, rolling his eyes, “is lost, Luna.")
